attributes.action: Put forward Roger Taylor & Brian May for a KBE in the Queens new years honours.
attributes.background: Founding members of Queen, Roger Taylor, Brian May have worked hard to raise awareness of AIDS/HIV via the Mercury Phoenix Trust  charity which was set up in honor of Freddie Mercury and have raised over £55 million pound to help fight this virus at home and overseas.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
